prompt.0: Please translate the following text from English to German. Do not ask questions and do not give further explanations, just return the translation. This is the text to translate: "The DSA-110, situated at the Owens Valley Radio Observatory (OVRO) near Bishop, California, is a radio interferometer built for simultaneous FRB discovery and arcsecond-scale localization. The DSA-110 underwent science commissioning and performed observations between February 2022 and March 2024 with a coherent core of 48 4.65-m antennas used for FRB searching combined with 15 outrigger antennas (maximum baseline of 2.5 km) used for localization. Each antenna is equipped with a dual-polarization ambient-temperature 1.28-1.53-GHz receiver. A custom low-noise amplifier design delivering 7 K noise temperature13 was central to achieving sensitivity to 1.9 Jy ms FRBs (for millisecond-duration events). A real-time search for FRBs with 0.262-ms sampling and a dispersion measure (DM) range up to 1,500 pc cm-3 was conducted.". Let’s work this out in a step by step way to be sure we have the right answer.

source_text.0: The DSA-110, situated at the Owens Valley Radio Observatory (OVRO) near Bishop, California, is a radio interferometer built for simultaneous FRB discovery and arcsecond-scale localization. The DSA-110 underwent science commissioning and performed observations between February 2022 and March 2024 with a coherent core of 48 4.65-m antennas used for FRB searching combined with 15 outrigger antennas (maximum baseline of 2.5 km) used for localization. Each antenna is equipped with a dual-polarization ambient-temperature 1.28-1.53-GHz receiver. A custom low-noise amplifier design delivering 7 K noise temperature13 was central to achieving sensitivity to 1.9 Jy ms FRBs (for millisecond-duration events). A real-time search for FRBs with 0.262-ms sampling and a dispersion measure (DM) range up to 1,500 pc cm-3 was conducted.

hypothesis.0:
Step 1: Translating "simultaneous FRB discovery and arcsecond-scale localization" into German. 
The translation for "simultaneous" is "simultane", and "FRB" is not a common word in German and needs to be translated as "Friedmannrundwellen" (a proper noun translation). 
"arcsecond-scale" translates to "Skalenseite". 

The translation for "simultane FRB discovery and arcsecond-scale localization" is: "Simultane Entdeckung von Friedmannrundwellen und Skalenseite-Lokalisierung". 

Step 2: Translating "The DSA-110, situated at the Owens Valley Radio Observatory (OVRO) near Bishop, California" into German.
The translation for "The" is "Die", 
"situated" translates to "gelegen", 
"Owens Valley Radio Observatory" translates to "Owens Valley Radioobservatorium".
"near" translates to "näher", 
"Bishop, California" translates to "Bishop, Kalifornien".

The translation for "The DSA-110, situated at the Owens Valley Radio Observatory (OVRO) near Bishop, California" is: "Die DSA-110, gelegen am Owens Valley Radioobservatorium (OVRO) näher Bishop, Kalifornien".

Step 3: Translating "built for simultaneous FRB discovery and arcsecond-scale localization" into German.
The translation for "built for" is "für" and "simultane" was already translated in step 1.
The translation for "built for simultaneous FRB discovery and arcsecond-scale localization" is: "für Simultane Entdeckung von Friedmannrundwellen und Skalenseite-Lokalisierung".

Step 4: Translating "The DSA-110 underwent science commissioning and performed observations" into German.
The translation for "The DSA-110" is the same as in step 2.
"underwent" translates to "erlebte".
"science commissioning" translates to "Wissenschaftskommissionierung".
"and performed observations" translates to "und Durchführungen der Beobachtungen" 

The translation for "The DSA-110 underwent science commissioning and performed observations" is: "Die DSA-110 erlebte Wissenschaftskommissionierung und Durchführungen der Beobachtungen".

Step 5: Translating "between February 2022 and March 2024" into German.
The translation for "between" is "zwischen", 
"February" translates to "Februar", 
"2022" translates to "2022", 
"and" translates to "und",
"March" translates to "März",
"2024" translates to "2024".

The translation for "between February 2022 and March 2024" is: "zwischen Februar 2022 und März 2024".

Step 6: Translating "with a coherent core of 48 4.65-m antennas used for FRB searching combined with 15 outrigger antennas" into German.
The translation for "with" is "mit".
"A coherent core" translates to "eine kohärente Kern", 
"of" translates to "von", 
"48" translates to "48", 
"4.65-m" translates to "4,65-m", 
"antennas" translates to "Antennen", 
"used for" translates to "für", 
"FRB" translates to "Friedmannrundwellen", 
"searching" translates to "suchend", 
"combined" translates to "kombiniert", 
"with" translates to "mit", 
"15" translates to "15", 
"outrigger"

reference_text.0: Der DSA-110, der sich am Owens Valley Radio Observatory (OVRO) in der Nähe von Bishop, Kalifornien, befindet, ist ein Radio-Interferometer, das für die gleichzeitige Entdeckung von FRBs und deren Lokalisierung im Bogensekundenmaßstab gebaut wurde. Der DSA-110 durchlief die wissenschaftliche Inbetriebnahme und führte Beobachtungen zwischen Februar 2022 und März 2024 durch. Er nutzte einen kohärenten Kern von 48 Antennen mit 4,65 m Durchmesser für die FRB-Suche sowie 15 Auslegerantennen (maximale Basislinie von 2,5 km) für die Lokalisierung. Jede Antenne ist mit einem dual-polarisierten 1,28–1,53-GHz-Empfänger bei Umgebungstemperatur ausgestattet. Ein speziell entworfener rauscharmer Verstärker, der eine Rauschtemperatur von 7 K liefert, war zentral für die Erreichung der Empfindlichkeit gegenüber FRBs von 1,9 Jy ms (für millisekundendauernde Ereignisse). Eine Echtzeitsuche nach FRBs mit einer Abtastrate von 0,262 ms und einem Dispersionsmaß (DM) von bis zu 1.500 pc cm⁻³ wurde durchgeführt.
